title: On functionals involving the $p$-capacity and the $q$-torsional rigidity
authors: Michiel van den Berg, Nunzia Gavitone
abstract:
Upper bounds are obtained for the $p$-capacity of compact sets in $\R^d$,
with $d \ge 2$ and $1<p<d$. Upper and lower bounds are obtained for the product
of $p$-capacity and powers of the $q$-torsional rigidity over the collection of
all non-empty, open, bounded and convex sets in $\R^d$ with either a perimeter
constraint, or a measure constraint, or a combination of perimeter and measure
constraints. For some range of parameters we identify the ball as the unique
(up to homotheties) maximiser or minimiser respectively.
